process.name: US-1859 - Execute permissions on referenced objects

input.name: Parent Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the Parent Node which child belongs to.

input.name: Child Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the child node to Check or Uncheck.

input.name: Check?
input.narrative: True if Item needs to be Checked, False if Item needs to be unchecked.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: New Role Name
input.narrative: Name of the new Role

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username of the user you wish to create.

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password in which you want to assign to the user.

input.name: User Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the user account will expire.

input.name: Password Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the password will expire.

input.name: Roles
input.narrative: The roles you wish to give to your user.

input.name: Password Duration
input.narrative: The duration, in weeks you wish the password to last before expiring.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: text passed from exception

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Process

input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: Exception text output

output.name: Success?
output.narrative: Flag determining if action was successful
